scripts.install-all: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.build-all: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.watch: npm run server & npm run client & npm run style
scripts.test: npm test --prefix client && npm test --prefix server
scripts.pre-deploy: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.postinstall: npm run pre-deploy && npm run deploy-db --prefix server
